description:
Head protection for everyday riding. Grab this helmet for workday commutes or weekend tours. It's loaded with vents for summertime comfort, with an adjustable dial fit system that's quick and fuss-free. MIPs adds an extra level of protection for your one-of-a-kind brain.

  • Light in-mold construction absorbs shock from impact without excess weight
  • Multi-directional Impact Protection System (MIPS) protects your brain from rotational forces
  • VaporFit system is easy to adjust for a custom fit
  • AirEvac ventilation features 21 vents for optimal air flow
  • Performance liner manages moisture effectively and comfortably
  • Helmet design makes it easy to wear sunglasses or secure them on top
name: Smith Signal MIPS Helmet - Unisex
